message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this great product to you for $170. I think you'll find it's a fantastic deal!
I'm really interested in the product, but $170 is a bit steep for me. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $100?
I appreciate your interest, Bob. While $170 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $140 for you. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but $140 is still a bit out of my budget. Would you be willing to sell it to me for $90?
